item.title: Cardinals placing QB Murray on injured reserve
item.description: The Cardinals are placing QB Kyler Murray on IR with a foot injury that kept him out since Week 5, meaning he'll miss at least four more games. Jacoby...

item.title: Sources: Warriors' Curry out; Green, Butler TBD
item.description: The Warriors will be without Steph Curry on Wednesday night against the Kings, and Jimmy Butler and Draymond Green are both questionable for the road ...

item.title: Colts energized by Sauce trade, eye CB's debut
item.description: Sauce Gardner joined his new Colts teammates and intends to play against the Falcons in Berlin if he clears concussion protocol.

item.title: McIlroy gets 'gracious' apology over Ryder abuse
item.description: Rory McIlroy said he got a personal apology from PGA of America CEO Derek Sprague over the abuse he and his wife endured at the Ryder Cup at Bethpage ...

item.title: Jazz C Kessler set for season-ending surgery
item.description: Jazz center Walker Kessler will undergo season-ending surgery to repair a torn labrum in his left shoulder.
